JobFullDesc: Raytheon Technologies is seeking a full-time employee to work as a VAK Field Service Representative in support of a DoD contract providing technical equipment advisory and support for USASOC elements. Responsibilities will include, but are not limited to the following: Mentor and advise senior military personnel on various equipment, technical capabilities and employment Techniques, Tactics, and Procedures (TTPs) Assist in the development and implementation of Concepts of Operations (CONOPs)Provide sustainment training as needed on specialized technical equipmentCoordination with RBT headquarters for specialized program support Required Skills:  Must have an Active Secret ClearanceRetired or former Special Operations soldier 5 years of United States military experience in a similar capacityRecent combat experience Experience with or technical information collection equipment to support War on Terrorism objectivesExperience with web-based applications including, but not limited to: Microsoft Office, Microsoft Windows, and various viewing software programs such as: FalconView, Google Earth, C2PC, Streets and Trips, and Map PointAbility to travel independently and operate for periods of time without supervisionMust be able to carry a 35 pound load with no assistanceCONUS and OCONUS travel requirements to support Unit  Desired Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skillsExcellent interpersonal, time management, and organizational skillsExcellent leadership skills and the ability to effectively interact and communicate with management, customers, and employees
